sections.heading: Definition
sections.text: 28.005 Definition. “Department” when used in this chapter without other words of description or qualification means the department of natural resources.

sections.heading: Cooperation
sections.text: 28.07 Cooperation. The department may cooperate with the University of Wisconsin System, with departments and agencies of this or other states, with federal agencies and with counties, towns, corporations and individuals, to promote the best interest of the people and the state in forest surveys, research in forestry and related subjects, forest protection and in assistance to landowners to secure adoption of better forestry practice. History: 1985 a. 13.

sections.heading: Income
sections.text: 28.08 Income. All income from state forest lands shall be paid into the state treasury to the credit of the conservation fund. History: 1977 c. 418.

sections.heading: Timber
sections.text: 28.085 Timber. The department shall allocate for forest grants under s. 26.38, for the forestry education grant program under s. 26.40, for school forest transportation funding under s. 26.39 (5), for transfer to the appropriation under s. 20.292 (1) (km) for master logger apprenticeship grants under s. 38.04 (29), or for forestry internships under s. 26.39. History: 2005 a. 25; 2007 a. 20.

sections.heading: Management
sections.text: 28.21 Management. Any municipality, by registering its forest with the department, shall be eligible to receive free planting stock from the state forest nurseries and the services of foresters in preparing and carrying out planting and forest management plans. No trees shall be cut except those marked or designated for cutting by a state forester. Products of the forest may be devoted to public use.

sections.heading: Income
sections.text: 28.23 Income. All income from community forests shall be paid into the treasury, but may be assigned to the support of any legally authorized activity.

sections.heading: “Department” when used in this chapter without other words of description or qualification means the department of natural resources.
sections.text: “Department” when used in this chapter without other words of description or qualification means the department of natural resources.

sections.heading: supervision.The department shall execute all matters pertaining to forestry within the jurisdiction of the state, direct the management of state forests, collect data relative to forest use and conditions and advance the cause of forestry within the state
sections.text: supervision.The department shall execute all matters pertaining to forestry within the jurisdiction of the state, direct the management of state forests, collect data relative to forest use and conditions and advance the cause of forestry within the state.

sections.heading: demonstration and education center.The department shall develop a plan to establish a forestry demonstration and education center.
sections.text: demonstration and education center.The department shall develop a plan to establish a forestry demonstration and education center.
